00044         PagingLandScapeData2D* PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC::newPage()
00045     {
00046        return new PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC(mParent);
00047     }
00048     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049     PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC::PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC(PagingLandScapeData2DManager *dataMgr)
00050     : PagingLandScapeData2D(dataMgr)
00051     {
00052             mImage = 0;
00053             input_max = 3000.0f;
00054         input_min = 0.0f;
00055         mMaxheight = _decodeTC (1.0f) * mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00056     }
00057     //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     const Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC::getMaxAbsoluteHeight(void) const
00059     { 
00060         return _decodeTC (1.0f) * mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00061     }

00078     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00079     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC::_save()
00080     {
00081       
00082             const Real scale = 1.0f  / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00083            
00084             uchar *img = mImage->getData();
00085             unsigned int j = 0;
00086             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMax - 1;  i ++)
00087             {
00088                 img[ i ] =  uchar (_encodeTC(mHeightData[j++]) * scale);               
00089             }
00090             const String fname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + "." +
00091                                     StringConverter::toString(mPageZ) + "." +
00092                                                 StringConverter::toString(mPageX) + ".";
00093             const String extname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00094 
00095 
00096             FileInfoListPtr finfo =  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo (
00097                     mParent->getOptions()->groupName, 
00098                     fname + extname);
00099             FileInfoList::iterator it = finfo->begin();
00100             if (it != finfo->end())
00101             {
00102                 //FileInfo *inf = &(*it);
00103                 char *olddir = ChangeToDir (const_cast< char * > (((it)->archive->getName()).c_str()));
00104                 //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory()
00105                 mImage->save (fname + "modif." + extname);
00106                 //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory();
00107                 RetablishDir (olddir);
00108             }
00109         
00110     }
00111     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00112     bool PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC::_load(const unsigned int mX, const unsigned int mZ)
00113     {
00114         const String strFileName = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + "." + 
00115                             StringConverter::toString(mZ) + "." +
00116                                         StringConverter::toString(mX) + ".";
00117         
00118         String finalName = strFileName + 
00119                         "modif." + 
00120                         mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00121         if (!(mParent->getOptions()->Deformable && 
00122             ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(mParent->getOptions()->groupName, 
00123             finalName)))
00124         {
00125             finalName = strFileName + 
00126                 mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;   
00127             if (!ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(mParent->getOptions()->groupName,
00128                 finalName))
00129             {
00130             
00131                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(String("PLSM2 : Cannot find map named ") + finalName, 
00132                     LML_CRITICAL,
00133                     true);
00134                 return false;
00135             }
00136         }
00137         mImage = new Image();
00138         mImage->load (finalName,  mParent->getOptions()->groupName); 
00139 
00140         //check to make sure it's 2^n + 1 size.
00141         if (mImage->getWidth() != mImage->getHeight() ||        
00142             !_checkSize(mImage->getWidth()))
00143         {
00144             String err = "Error: Invalid heightmap size : " +
00145                 StringConverter::toString(static_cast<int>(mImage->getWidth())) +
00146                 "," + StringConverter::toString(static_cast<int>(mImage->getHeight())) +
00147                 ". Should be 2^n+1, 2^n+1";
00148             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, err, "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00149         }
00150 
00151         mBpp = PixelUtil::getNumElemBytes (mImage->getFormat ());
00152         if (mBpp != 1)
00153         {
00154             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Error: Image is not a gray image.(1 bytes, 8 bits)", 
00155                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00156         }
00157 
00158         if (mSize != mImage->getWidth())
00159         {
00160             OGRE_EXCEPT (Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Error: Declared World size <> Height Map Size.", "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00161         }
00162 
00163         mXDimension = mImage->getWidth();
00164         mZDimension = mImage->getHeight();
00165         mMax = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mImage->getHeight() + 1);
00166 
00167         mMaxArrayPos = mMax - 1;
00168         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00169         unsigned int j = 0;
00170         const double divider = 1.0 / 255;
00171         const Real scale  = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00172         uchar *data = mImage->getData();
00173         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00174         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMax - 1;  i++)
00175             {  
00176                 const Real h = _decodeTC(data[ i ] * divider)* scale;
00177                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00178                 mHeightData[j++] = h;
00179             }
00180         return true;
00181     }
00182     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00183     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC::_load()
00184     {
00185           mImage = new Image();
00186         mImage->load (mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename +
00187                 "." + mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension, mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00188         mBpp = PixelUtil::getNumElemBytes (mImage->getFormat ());
00189                 if (mBpp != 1)
00190                 {
00191                         OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Error: Image is not a greyscale image.(1 byte, 8 bits)",
00192                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightField::_load");
00193                 }
00194 
00195         mXDimension = mImage->getWidth();
00196         mZDimension = mImage->getHeight();
00197 
00198         const size_t sourceHeight = mZDimension;
00199         const size_t sourceWidth = mXDimension;
00200 
00201         computePowerof2PlusOneSize ();     
00202 
00203                 mSize = mXDimension;
00204         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension * mZDimension);
00205         mMax = static_cast <unsigned int> (mMaxArrayPos * mBpp);
00206         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00207 
00208         const Real divider = 1.0f / 65535.0f;
00209         const Real scale  = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00210         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00211         const unsigned int shift_fill = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension - sourceWidth);
00212         uchar *imagedata = mImage->getData();
00213         unsigned int dest_pos = 0;
00214         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sourceHeight; ++i)
00215         {
00216             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sourceWidth; ++j)
00217             {   
00218                 const Real h = _decodeTC(*imagedata++ * divider)* scale;
00219                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00220                 mHeightData[dest_pos++] = h;
00221             }
00222             memset (&mHeightData[dest_pos], 0, shift_fill);
00223             dest_pos += shift_fill; 
00224         }                   
00225 
00226            
00227     }
00228

00230     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00231     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC::_unload()
00232     {   
00233             delete mImage;
00234             mImage = 0;
00235     }
00236 
00237     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00238     inline Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC::_decodeTC(const Real encoded) const
00239     {
00240             return ((Real) (encoded + 0.5f)) * (input_max - input_min) + input_min;
00241     }
00242 
00243     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00244     inline uchar PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldTC::_encodeTC(const Real decoded) const
00245     {
00246         return static_cast<uchar> ((decoded - input_min) / (input_max - input_min) - 0.5f);
00247     }
